DOC.brief_summary: To determine whether gene expression analysis of primary tumor samples before and after chemotherapy are predictive of long-term survival in pediatric patients with bone sarcomas (Ewings sarcoma (ES) and Osteosarcoma(OS)).
DOC.brief_title: Genomic Analysis of Pediatric Bone Tumors
DOC.criteria: All patients with bone xrays suggestive of a malignant bone tumor Patients with a known diagnosis of cancer.
